Arcanists from Thulsa's Brogar Legion are using amulets of some sort to control their golems. If we could seize those amulets, the golems would be harmless!

Hunt down some {@LinkCreature:27#9#Thulsan dreadweavers} and {@LinkCreature:27#11#Thulsan arcanists} and recover their amulets.

Be wary, . The Brogar Legion's reputation came at great cost.

Excellent work! Now there will be fewer golems to worry about.

None of this would have been possible without your help, . Thank you.
Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:27#9#Thulsan dreadweavers} and {@LinkCreature:27#11#Thulsan arcanists} controlling the golems.
